name: H=N BLOCK+A.extend(Kit of Parts){°02}
description:
This OBJKT extends the functionality of H=N BLOCK+A, 
by holding it, this Kit of 7 animated Parts gets unlocked. 
_________________ 
H=N BLOCK+A is an extension patch(Architecture Kit) for H=N BLOCK, enabling realtime collaborative and participatory design using an architectural kit of parts.
_________________ 
How to place your new parts @H=N BLOCK+A:
press: [t] to enable this (Kit of Parts){°02}
press: [1|2|3|4|5|6|7] to select a specific part of the current Kit of Parts
press: [8] enable random part selection mode of the current Kit of Parts
[LeftClick] to place a Part
[RightClick] to delete your Part
Press: [r] to use again the standard Kit of Parts
_________________ 
Navigation @H=N BLOCK+A:
move foreward,left,backward ,right: [w, a, s, d]
move up,down: [q, e]
rotate: [LeftClickHold + move Mouse in direction]
_________________ 
by Alexander Grasser, 2021 @grasser_alex alexandergrasser.com #collaborativeobjects #realtimearchitecture #architecturemachine
